document.full_text: a day after denying that any of its citizens had been involved, china confirmed tuesday that chinese technicians were taken hostage during a militant attack on a pakistani naval base.
document.title: asia: pakistan: chinese held in attack
lines_and_colors: a day after denying that any of its citizens had been involved, china confirmed tuesday that chinese technicians were taken hostage during a militant attack on a pakistani naval base.
